ingredients.item: 250g baby Chantenay carrots, trimmed and halved

instructions.step: Heat the oil in a large frying pan and fry the aubergine, onion and carrots for 5 minutes. Add the passata, vegetable stock, horseradish and rosemary, cover and cook for 15 minutes or until the vegetables are just tender.
Meanwhile, cook the pasta in boiling water for 10-12 minutes, drain and stir into the vegetables.
